title: Identify process with molecular speed distribution

content.prompt: The graph above shows the initial and final molecular speed distributions of a gas as a result of a thermodynamic process. Which of the following processes could produce this change?

choices.label: Expansion of the gas at constant temperature
Compression of the gas with no transfer of energy by heating
Cooling of the gas at constant volume
Cooling of the gas at constant pressure

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
